entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -16.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Watson Lake Airport 8:00 PM MST Wednesday 08 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -16.4°C

Visibility: 12.9 km
Humidity: 74 %

Dewpoint: -19.9°C

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 08 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 9.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 37 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 08 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 24. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 08 March 2023
